column4: Hi guys.  I just built my own computer.  I'm able to install ubuntu, even get compiz running, but its very unstable.  Anything can cause the computer to hang and become completely unresponsive.  Today, I can't even boot, so if I have to reinstall, it will be the third time
I don't know.... I can run it, but it crashes a lot
you might need to check all the hardware again.
